thread.title: Norway: European Investment Bank boosts expansion of Bergen airport (EIB - European Investment Bank)
thread.title_full: Norway: European Investment Bank boosts expansion of Bergen airport (EIB - European Investment Bank) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Norway: European Investment Bank boosts expansion of Bergen airport (EIB - European Investment Bank)
text: ( Source : EIB - European Investment Bank ) The European Investment Bank (EIB) has provided a EUR 200 million long-term loan to Norwegian airport operator Avinor AS for the expansion and upgrade of Bergen airport to cater for growing traffic
